Details

Name as Parent - this is a special case of NameAsOther that uses the lexical parent of a nested object as the target object. (The lexical parent is the enclosing object in a nested object definition; in other words, it’s the object in which the nested object is embedded.)

class NameAsParent :   NameAsOther

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)
